nodes.text: Star Wars: The Special Edition Box Set
Star Wars: The Special Edition Box Set was a box set collecting the Star Wars Special Edition Trilogy Trade paperbacks.

Featuring a myriad of talent, including Al Williamson, Bruce Jones, Archie Goodwin, Eduardo Barreto, and the Brothers Hildebrandt, all three of the Star Wars Special Edition trade paperbacks are collected in this slipcased set! This boxed set is perfect for the completist Star Wars collector!
